title: Bloodstain
description: What turns a man into a killer? Can simple words drive a man to commit murder?****Detective Jason Strong must find a killer whose signature is a wine glass. That is about all the police know except that his victims all share certain similiarities. The case gets personal when someone close to Jason is targeted and time is running out.In the exciting follow-up to Where's My Son?, Jason will be pushed to find a way to solve this case before the unthinkable happens.
author: John C. Dalglish
